phrs.translation: 雷曼兄弟；雷曼兄弟控股公司

sentences.sentence: He has profited by selling his holdings to other investors.
sentences.translation: 他已通过将他所持有的卖给其他投资者们而获利。

sentences.sentence: Goshawk Insurance Holdings, which insures aircraft around the world, said rates had soared as much as 10-fold since the Sept. 11 terror attacks.
sentences.translation: 为全球飞机提供保险的 Goshawk Insurance Holdings 称，自9月11日恐袭以后，保险费率已飙升了10倍之多。

sentences.sentence: Their movements through the region were calculated to terrify landowners into abandoning their holdings.
sentences.translation: 他们在整个地区的行动意在恐吓地主们放弃其财产。
